definitions.definition: The now extinct Semitic language of ancient Mesopotamia , formerly used as an international language of diplomacy .

main_definition: The now extinct Semitic language of ancient Mesopotamia , formerly used as an international language of diplomacy .

definitions.definition: A Semitic inhabitant of the region of Mesopotamia near the city of Akkad .

main_definition: A Semitic inhabitant of the region of Mesopotamia near the city of Akkad .
